oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Mkuan (XV)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Mkuan gives the names of some of his relations, namely his paternal grandfather and two of his children. 1) See also Words and sentences: Mkuan at the Breakwater and At Breakwater, 17 April 1880, 2) This story is found in Book XV-1.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The |xam names of some of Mkuan's relations
